attributes.additional_details:
The government are proposing to move the boundaries in Manchester which would mean a lot of the iconic areas in SALFORD would become Manchester and other areas would be dispersed. Salford is its own city and deserves to stay that way! The people of Salford are proud! The maternity unit was a vital part of the city, its being taken away!
we are proud of Salford and want it stay
THE CITY OF SALFORD

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England which is a body independant of Government. The Commission is currently conducting a consultation on its latest boundary report.
